pages.text: $(turtlemancy)Turtlemancers$() can obtain $(thing)essences$() out of different creatures. Many creatures may be different of each other, but in $(thing)essence$(), they are the same. Currently we have discovered $(thing)7$() different $(thing)essences$():$(li)$(turtlemancy)Turtle Essence$()$(li)$(#d63031)Arthropod Essence$()$(li)$(#0984e3)Water Creature Essence$()$(li)$(#ff7675)Animal Essence$()$(li)$(#636e72)Undead Essence$()$(li)$(#fab1a0)Human Essence$()$(li)$(#6c5ce7)End Essence$()
Use an empty glass bottle on a $(turtle) to get this $(thing)essence$().
Use an empty glass bottle on a $(#d63031)spider$() (of any kind), $(#d63031)endermite$(), $(#d63031)bee$(), or $(#d63031)silver fish$() to get this $(thing)essence$().
Use an empty glass bottle on a $(#0984e3)fish$()(of any kind), $(#0984e3)dolphin$(), $(#0984e3)squid$(), $(#0984e3)guardian$() to get this $(thing)essence$().
Use an empty glass bottle on any $(#ff7675)animal$() which doesn't belong to any of the previous categories to get this $(thing)essence$().
Use an empty glass bottle on any $(#636e72)undead$() creature to get this $(thing)essence$().
Use an empty glass bottle on any living $(#fab1a0)human$() creature to get this $(thing)essence$().
Use an empty glass bottle on an $(#6c5ce7)enderman$() to get this $(thing)essence$().
